E10: Motors starting.; Flight mode changed to P-GPS.
E5: Data Recorder File Index is 80.; Set Return to Home (RTH) altitude to 100 m (328 ft).; Set maximum flight altitude to 500 m (1640 ft).; Flight mode changed to Starting Motors.
E7: Flight mode changed to Manual Takeoff.
E1: Image transmission signal weak.; Image transmission signal weak. Adjust antennas and make sure they are perpendicular to flight direction of aircraft.
E3: Auto landing in progress.; Make sure the area under the aircraft is safe for landing. Push throttle down to use force landing.
